CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1962, pg. C3, reads: "Photos of Your Pittsburgh Story Rally - Award Winners - Mrs. Alma Polk and the Rev. Charles H. Foggie, of Wesley Center, admire the awards they received as AME Rev. S. A. Speight and Mrs. Polk's children, Alice (left), and Alma, look on"
TitMainTitle: Alma Polk, Rev. S. A. Speight, and Rev. Charles H. Foggie posed in Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall for Pittsburgh Courier newspaper's Appreciation Day rally
